attributes.action: Add Race Education to our national curriculum.
attributes.background:
Racism within the UK will not go away without education, we need to take a step towards eradicating racism by teaching our children about racial equality and add this to the schools syllabus.
We have to shape the future of the UK with the next generation and racial equality should be the priority.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition that we currently have open:
Create more curriculum around diversity and inclusion within secondary schools.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580816
